snippet: Mike Redmond, who spent the past two years managing Class A teams in the Toronto Blue Jays’ system, was hired as the manager of the Miami Marlins.
abstract: Miami Marlins hire Mike Redmond as their new manager; Redmond spent past two years managing Class A teams in Toronto Blue Jays system.
lead_paragraph: Mike Redmond, who spent the past two years managing Class A teams in the Toronto Blue Jays’ system, was hired as the manager of the Miami Marlins.
